name: Lucy and Aslan
description:
″Why, Sir," said Lucy. ‘I think – I don’t know – but I think I could be brave enough.‘"

I have inspiration from "Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe" . This is the first time Lucy meet Aslan. He is the king of Narnia. Although he look a frightening, she don't afraid. I admire her courage although she just a little girl and the youngest of the four children. She is hopeful and brave. Just the thought of Luce, she makes me feel I could be brave like her
